item.title: Romeo and Juliet Act 1
item.description: Prologue- What is the place and setting of the play? The Prologue reveals the setting of the play. ( Fun fact the town is located between Milan and Venice Italy.) What is the relationship between the two households? In lines 26-27 of Act 1 Scene 1, Sampras’s statement reveals the relationships between the two households. What does Shakespeare mean by “Star-crossed lovers”? People who believe in Astrology believe that the stars control human destiny.
